word_mean: 出现于连续发展阶段中的，如突然进化

sentence.Network_en: Emergent democracies created markets that were ripe for exploitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 新兴的民主国家创造了可供开拓的成熟市场.

sentence.Network_en: Emergent light is no longer continuous.
sentence.Network_cn: 透过的光不再是连续的.

sentence.Network_en: We could say that computer viruses are the first examples of emergent artificial life.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可以说计算机病毒是自然发生(emergent) 的人工生命(artificiallife)的第一例.

emergency theory of emotion 情绪应急论emergent 突变emergent clusters 自发性簇
emergence angle 出射角emergent 出射的emergent light 出射光
石油词汇英语翻译(EF) ... emergent wave 出射波 emergent 射出的 emerging ray 出射线.

list.abs: 自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... adjust vt. 调整，调节；校准 emergency n. 紧急情况；突发事件 reset vt./n. 重新安排，重调.
医学英语教程_百度文库 ... pregnancy 妊娠 emergency 紧急，急救 fluency 流利，流畅.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... script 写→手写→手稿） emerge v 浮现，出现（e出+ emersion n 浮现，出现（e出+.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... eject 投出，掷出 emerge 浮现 evade 逃出，逃避.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'occurring unexpectedly'): from Latin emergent- 'arising from', from the verb emergere (see emerge)

entry.tran: （国家、政治运动、社会团体等）新兴的，兴起的
entry.def: An emergent country, political movement, or social group is one that is becoming powerful or coming into existence.

auth_sentence.content: An emergent shore line with offshore bar and lagoon.
auth_sentence.res_content: An emergent shore line with offshore bar and lagoon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An emergent shore line with offshore bar and lagoon.

auth_sentence.content: It may occur as a slowly emergent property.
auth_sentence.res_content: It may occur as a slowly emergent property.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It may occur as a slowly emergent property.

auth_sentence.content: Shermer said both are examples of emergent behavior.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shermer said both are examples of emergent behavior.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧急的, 浮现的, 突然出现的, 自然发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: emerge[v.浮现]+ent表形容词→突然出现的→紧急的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧急情况,突然事件,非常时刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: emerge[v.浮现]+ency表名词→突然出现的事情
e出+merg投入;淹没+e→淹没的东西出现→浮现
merg沉,没+e→沉下→融为一体→合并
